OOC: Oh, nah. The whip is connected to Epyon's shield, and he retracted
it.

::Prowl/Hot Rod/Epyon/Skyburst::

They all landed at the base of the caves, and all were now in bot mode.
They watched as SS and D-13 meade their way out.
Prowl still kept an eye on Luzbel, waiting to see if the dragon would
leave like the others, or attack again.

Hot Rod steped up.
"Well, that takes care of that. Are the Chivtron's ok? As well as the
nine of us?"
